body_html:
It goes beyond that.
After a close look i now see that your ios framework is in fact a c++ library just wrapped to be downloaded by cocoapods.
So it seems we have absolutly no way to use swift with tensorflow except if we wrappe everything ourselves

body:
It goes beyond that.
After a close look i now see that your ios framework is in fact a c++ library just wrapped to be downloaded by cocoapods.
So it seems we have absolutly no way to use swift with tensorflow except if we wrappe everything ourselves
